name: ダスト
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on ground hit: 16F
Floating crumple on ground hit: Total 28F (airborne hitstun 1-11F, standing hitstun 12-18F, can block 19-28F)
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5D is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Has no additional Combo Decay on initial hit, unlike other overheads (usually adding +5 on initial hit for 10 total).
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 5K
notes: Dash cancel is -15 on block.

name: 溜めダスト
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on raw hit: 45F
On Hit/Block gains Tension equivalent to Level 2 despite other Level 4 properties.
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5[D] is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Wall Damage when hit raw is increased to 700 (900).
Applies 5 less Combo Decay on initial hit, for 0 Combo Decay if the first hit of a combo.
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 6HS
notes:
Airborne frames 5-31.
High profile frames 5-32.

name: 6K
notes: Forced crouching on hit, always granting +1 hitstun on hit.

name: 6P
notes: If the first hit of a combo, applies an additional +20 Combo Decay.

name: 近S
notes:
Input Proximity Range: 270
Dash cancel is -10 on block.

name: ワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
notes:
Guard crush duration: 35F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.
Staggers on grounded hit. Listed on-hit value is for gold (fast) recovery.
Total stagger duration: 34F (1-26F hitstun, 27-34F can block only)
Hitstun duration is increased by 4F for red (normal) recovery, and 8F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (30F and 34F respectively)
Total duration is increased by 5F for red (normal) recovery, and 10F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (39F and 44F respectively)

input: 溜めワイルドアサルト(236[D])
name: 溜めワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
notes:
Guard crush duration: 39F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.

name: 投げ
notes:
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15
Range of 90000
Zato's on-hit animation is 74 frames long. Eddie can combo the opponent starting frame 32.
0f hitstop.

name: 空投げ
notes:
Air Throws have both normal recovery (which recovers CH) and special recovery frames upon landing (not CH). It is technically possible to recover mid-air from a whiffed Air Throw, but it usually doesn't happen unless done from very high in the air.
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
On-Hit value is for attacker's IAD height, except for Potemkin and Nagoriyuki, who have their instant Air Throw height instead.
Frame advantage is highest at normal jump height and lowest at IAD height (+45 to +48).
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15
Eddie can combo the opponent starting frame 49 of the on-hit animation.
Both hits have 0f hitstop.

name: エディ召喚
notes:
Unsummon can only be done if the Eddie gauge is not empty.
Eddie starts regenerating gauge the frame after being unsummoned. Eddie does not lose or gain gauge HP during his first frame unsummoned, but unsummoning the same frame Eddie's attacks use gauge still spends gauge.

name: ブレイク・ザ・ロウ
caption: VANISH INTO DARK
notes:
Moves backwards during initial movement on frames 1 up to 95 (on a full hold backwards)
Decreases Tension Balance during the initial movement, for a total of -295 (maximum distance) Tension Balance.
Increases Negative value during the initial movement, for a total  590~1180 Negative value (amount varies and increases with distance to the opponent).

name: エディダッシュ
caption: Eddie dash
notes:
The area where Eddie must be in to start a dash is slightly behind Zato, up to about the range of Zato's 2S.
If 214S is done during Eddie's hitstop, Eddie's dash will be buffered until after hitstop ends. See the [[GGST/Zato-1/Frame_Data#Buffering_Eddie_Cancels|Frame Data]] section for more info.
Eddie's dash invuln also protects against Blue and Gold Burst.
Eddie can still dash if the Eddie gauge is empty.

name: エディスワップ
notes: When submerged, inputting 22 ([[File:InputIcon_2.png|24x24px|link=|alt=2]][[File:InputIcon_2.png|24x24px|link=|alt=2]]) will cause Zato to exit Break The Law while teleporting to Eddie's location.

name: インヴァイトヘル
caption: Tallest pointWidest point
notes:
Projectile will continue if Purple Roman Canceled on frame 8 at the earliest.
Clash Level: 1
Clash Hits: 1

name: 「張り合う」
caption: GuardpointAttack
notes:
Eddie spawns on frame 9 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled a frame after spawn.
Uses 5 HP of Eddie gauge each frame the move is active, each attack uses 900 HP of the Eddie gauge.
If Eddie is already summoned, 236H uses 3 HP of the Eddie gauge each frame the move is active and each hit from the attack portion uses 675HP (2025HP total).

name: 「多い」
caption: Tendies!
notes:
Eddie spawns on frame 9 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled a frame after spawn.
Uses 375 HP of Eddie gauge for each attack (1500 HP total). If Eddie is already summoned 236K uses 281 HP of the Eddie gauge for each attack (1124 HP total).

name: 「突く」
notes:
Eddie spawns on frame 9 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled a frame after spawn.
Uses 500 HP of the Eddie gauge for each attack (1000 HP total). If Eddie is already summoned this attack uses 375 HP of the Eddie gauge for each attack (750 HP total).

name: 「跳ねる」
notes:
Eddie spawns on frame 9 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled a frame after spawn.
Uses 1500 HP of the Eddie gauge. If Eddie is already summoned 236S uses 1125 HP of the Eddie Gauge.

name: ダムドファング
caption:
&quot
I love shark week&quot
- Eddie
notes:
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15
First does 13 hits of 1 damage (unaffected by defense mod, risc scaling, or guts), then does one final hit for 69 damage
Zato's on-hit animation is 242 frames long. Deals the final hit and refills the Eddie Gauge on frame 181.
Unsummons Eddie on hit, entering white regeneration. The unsummon is buffered if during &quot
Leap&quot
or &quot
Oppose&quot
.

name: エディ収納
notes:
Eddie spawns on frame 9 and will continue even if Purple Roman Cancelled a frame after spawn.
Consumes 3 HP (of 3000 total) of the Eddie gauge per frame Eddie is idling.
Eddie uses 0 HP of the Eddie gauge per frame during frames 9-20. The Eddie gauge also does not regenerate in this time.
If Zato is in hitstop, Eddie idling will use 0 HP of Eddie gauge each frame.
Eddie becomes actionable on frame 21.

name: 「張り合う」
caption: GuardpointAttack
notes:
Uses 5 HP of Eddie gauge each frame the move is active, each attack uses 900 HP of the Eddie gauge on frame 74, 77, and 84. There is an extra frame of gauge usage during the active frames.

If Zato is in hitstop or if Eddie is in &quot
Oppose&quot
's attack or guardpoint hitstop, &quot
Oppose&quot
will use 0 HP of Eddie gauge each frame.

Horizontal Activation Range: 0-500 - ''&quot
Oppose&quot
's attack cannot hit behind Eddie.''

Each of &quot
Oppose&quot
's attacks have 7f hitstop.

Eddie will buffer an unsummon during the active and recovery frames. See the [[GGST/Zato-1/Frame_Data#Buffering_Eddie_Cancels|Frame Data]] section for more info.

If Eddie is hit through the guardpoint, he will be hit and unsummoned the same frame he overlaps a hitbox. When guardpointing, Eddie is put in guardpoint hitstop the frame after overlapping a hitbox. Eddie acts out of guardpoint hitstop a frame before the guardpointed attack does.

Attacks lose their hitbox after touching the guardpoint, even if the Guard Point is deactivated and/or the hitbox changes. Multi-Hit attacks will reactivate their hitbox when the second hit starts.

An attacker is able to use their attack's cancel options after hitting &quot
Oppose&quot
's guardpoint, which includes on-block cancels such as RRC.

Does not pass-through frames 59-83. The collision box stops the opponent at Eddie's midpoint.

name: 「多い」
caption: Tendies!
notes:
Uses 375 HP of Eddie gauge for each attack (1500 HP total) on frames 10, 28, 43, and 58.
Clash Level: 1
Clash Hits: 1×4
The attack is made up of multiple seperate hits and does not behave as a single multi-hit attack:
* The total R.I.S.C. Loss is unaffected, however positive R.I.S.C. is reduced by 25% 2 times in total.
* All hits made by sources other than the first one to connect will be scaled by the added R.I.S.C.
* Attack only deals the maximum damage from at least 1068 R.I.S.C. (approx. 8.3% gauge) as a result.
An individual drill will still continue if Eddie is hit, Unsummoned, or turns into Sun Void during it's active frames or 6 frames before it becomes active (5 frames before if Eddie is Clap Cancelled or Dash Cancelled).
Hitstop: 0 for Eddie, 6 for a Drill projectile.

name: 「突く」
notes:
Uses 500 HP of the Eddie Gauge for each attack (1000 HP total) on frames 9 and 31.
Does not pass-through frames 9-32. The collision box stops the opponent at Eddie's midpoint.
6f hitstop.

name: 「跳ねる」
notes: Uses 1500 HP of the Eddie gauge on frame 4.

name: アモルファス
notes:
Projectile spawns during super freeze on frame 9 and can be Purple Roman Canceled immediately after end of super freeze.
Clash Level: -
Clash Hits: -
When Zato is in Amorphous' animation or cinematic recovery (Frames 1-67), the Eddie gauge will not regenerate, and will not be used by Eddie idling.
0f hitstop.
Zato cannot be Counter Hit during startup (Can be R.I.S.C counterhit).

name: サンヴォイド
notes:
Projectile spawns during super freeze on frame 11 and can be Purple Roman Canceled immediately after end of super freeze.
Clash Level: 4
Clash Hits: 3

From frames 1-11, Eddie cannot receive new actions such as movement or negative edge, and will continue his movement from the frame before.
When Zato is in Sunvoid's animation or cinematic recovery (Frames 1-73), the Eddie gauge will not regenerate, and will not be used by Eddie idling.

The Eddie gauge will be refilled and a summoned Eddie will transform into Sun Void during the super freeze on frame 11, cancelling Eddie's hitstop. See the [[GGST/Zato-1/Frame_Data#Buffering_Eddie_Cancels|Frame Data]] section for more info.

The projectile is removed if Zato is hit or blocks a hit, and the Eddie gauge will be depleted using the same rules as if Eddie was summoned.

The projectile inflicts 8f of hitstop, and takes 3f of hitstop on each hit.

After leaving hitstop, the projectile will have 2 frames before the next multihit becomes active.

Zato cannot be Counter Hit during the startup of Sun Void (Can be R.I.S.C counterhit).

Sun Void has an extended [[GGST/Mechanics#Tension_Penalty|Tension Penalty]] of 460 frames when used.

name: サンヴォイド
notes:
Projectile spawns during super freeze on frame 11 and can be Purple Roman Canceled immediately after end of super freeze.
Clash Level: 4
Clash Hits: 3
